title: Apple
description: Apple is a fruit that is sweet and crunchy.

title: Banana
description: Banana is a soft, sweet fruit known for its high potassium content.

title: Grape
description: Grape is a small, juicy fruit that comes in clusters and can be eaten fresh or made into wine.

title: Orange
description: Orange is a citrus fruit known for its tangy taste and high vitamin C content.

title: Strawberry
description: Strawberry is a bright red, juicy fruit known for its sweet flavor and seeds on the outside.

title: Watermelon
description: Watermelon is a refreshing summer fruit with a sweet, watery flesh and green rind.

title: Pineapple
description: Pineapple is a tropical fruit with a spiky exterior and sweet, tangy yellow flesh.

title: Mango
description: Mango is a tropical fruit with juicy orange flesh and a distinct sweet flavor.

title: Peach
description: Peach is a soft, fuzzy fruit with sweet, juicy flesh and a central pit.

title: Pear
description: Pear is a juicy fruit with a soft texture and a mildly sweet flavor.

title: Cherry
description: Cherry is a small, round fruit with a sweet or tart flavor and a pit in the center.

title: Kiwi
description: Kiwi is a small, brown-skinned fruit with bright green flesh and a tangy taste.

title: Plum
description: Plum is a stone fruit with a smooth skin and sweet, juicy flesh.

title: Blueberry
description: Blueberry is a small, round berry known for its sweet taste and high antioxidant content.

title: Raspberry
description: Raspberry is a juicy, tart fruit that grows in clusters and is rich in fiber.

title: Lemon
description: Lemon is a sour citrus fruit often used for its juice and zest in cooking and beverages.

title: Lime
description: Lime is a small, green citrus fruit with a tangy flavor often used in drinks and dishes.

title: Papaya
description: Papaya is a tropical fruit with sweet orange flesh and black seeds in the center.

title: Pomegranate
description: Pomegranate is a fruit with a tough outer skin and juicy, red seeds inside.

title: Coconut
description: Coconut is a tropical fruit with a hard shell, white flesh, and refreshing water inside.

title: Avocado
description: Avocado is a creamy, nutrient-rich fruit often used in salads and spreads.

title: Fig
description: Fig is a sweet fruit with a soft, chewy texture and tiny seeds inside.

title: Grapefruit
description: Grapefruit is a large citrus fruit with a tangy flavor and juicy segments.

title: Apricot
description: Apricot is a small, orange fruit with a sweet, tart flavor and smooth skin.

title: Guava
description: Guava is a tropical fruit with a sweet, fragrant flavor and edible seeds.
